hd.welcome.title: Welcome to Holidays
hd.desc.heading: Holidays are the days of festivity or recreation in various geographies when campaigns do not normally run.
hd.desc.body: You can map those holidays to various campaigns to put them on hold from running.
hd.map.title: Map Holiday to Campaign
hd.delete.text: The deletion of Holiday is permanent and not recoverable. Proceed with caution.
